element.name: Slí Slán Breise by orangetigerprawn, Multi-cache (2/2.5)

long-description.center: This is the last of three multicache based around the Slí na Sláinte routes in Swords. This one follows the River Valley Park variation of the Highfield Slí. The walks are circular routes to be walked in either direction from any starting point.

Similarly, this cache can be started from any waypoint in any order. Find the required information at each waypoint, work out the final coordinates and find the cache. The cache is most easily done on foot or by bike as most of the stages and the final location are within the park. This Slí is about 4.5k long. The cache only follows part of the trail. Start to finish this cache covers a distance of about 2k; you'll have to make your own way back.

A handy pdf map of walks can be downloaded
here.

At the above coordinates:
How many spheres are watching for the troll? A
Play Stage: N 53° 27.444 W 006° 14.504
How many entrances are there to this area? B

Island Stage: N 53° 27.394 W 006° 14.579
How many trees on the island? C
Hill Stage: N 53° 27.391 W 006° 14.508
How many steps on the ninth flight down? D
Church Stage: N 53° 27.212 W 006° 14.490
How many rows of cars can park here? E

element.additional-waypoints:
CS21AJP - Church Stage
N 53° 27.212 W 006° 14.490
HS21AJP - Hill Stage
N 53° 27.391 W 006° 14.508
IS21AJP - Island Stage
N 53° 27.394 W 006° 14.579
PS21AJP - Play Stage
N 53° 27.444 W 006° 14.504

ul.li:
2010-04-13T19:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Lazily I drove this one (mostly). I had to do it over two visits though as I miscounted at the Play Stage. Nice walk on both occasions, and I had great weather for it.

2009-12-28T20:00:00Z : Found it by theswerve
Bit of a longer walk this...bit of crunching of maths but got there after hint from owner...TFTC...

2009-12-10T20:00:00Z : Found it by toczygroszek
How can I miss this one last time?? I'm pretty sure I was looking at that place where I found cache now, must be magical container [:D] And I think that is 2nd cache in Swords area where description mentioned about troll - it looks this town must be full of these creatures. Beware of trolls! :bad: Really thanks for walk in nice area

2009-12-07T20:00:00Z : Didn't find it by toczygroszek
I think I figured out coordinates correct, and place was pretty obvious, but spent too much time looking for "Slí Slán Amhain", and arrived there at darkness. Want sure about coordinates, so just checked most obvious place but didn't find there cache... [:(]
Very bad geocaching day :sad:

2009-12-07T20:00:00Z : Found it by Hezekiah
Found easily - great day for a walkabout! TFTC!

wpt.name: GC21AJP
wpt.desc: Slí Slán Breise by orangetigerprawn, Multi-cache (2/2.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Slí Slán Breise
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This is the last of three multicache based around the Slí na Sláinte routes in Swords. This one follows the River Valley Park variation of the Highfield Slí. The walks are circular routes to be walked in either direction from any starting point.


Similarly, this cache can be started from any waypoint in any order. Find the required information at each waypoint, work out the final coordinates and find the cache. The cache is most easily done on foot or by bike as most of the stages and the final location are within the park. This Slí is about 4.5k long. The cache only follows part of the trail. Start to finish this cache covers a distance of about 2k; you'll have to make your own way back.


A handy pdf map of walks can be downloaded here.
 

At the above coordinates:
How many spheres are watching for the troll? A

Play Stage: N 53° 27.444 W 006° 14.504
How many entrances are there to this area? B

Island Stage: N 53° 27.394 W 006° 14.579
How many trees on the island? C

Hill Stage: N 53° 27.391 W 006° 14.508
How many steps on the ninth flight down? D

Church Stage: N 53° 27.212 W 006° 14.490
How many rows of cars can park here? E

 


The Cache

Final Location: N 53° 27.A*B*D*E+A+E
W 006° A+B+E.(BCB*E)


 


Additional Waypoints

CS21AJP - Church Stage
N 53° 27.212 W 006° 14.490

HS21AJP - Hill Stage
N 53° 27.391 W 006° 14.508

IS21AJP - Island Stage
N 53° 27.394 W 006° 14.579

PS21AJP - Play Stage
N 53° 27.444 W 006° 14.504

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Lazily I drove this one (mostly). I had to do it over two visits though as I miscounted at the Play Stage. Nice walk on both occasions, and I had great weather for it.
Bit of a longer walk this...bit of crunching of maths but got there after hint from owner...TFTC...

How can I miss this one last time?? I'm pretty sure I was looking at that place where I found cache now, must be magical container [:D] And I think that is 2nd cache in Swords area where description mentioned about troll - it looks this town must be full of these creatures. Beware of trolls! :bad: Really thanks for walk in nice area

I think I figured out coordinates correct, and place was pretty obvious, but spent too much time looking for "Slí Slán Amhain", and arrived there at darkness. Want sure about coordinates, so just checked most obvious place but didn't find there cache... [:(]
Very bad geocaching day :sad:
Found easily - great day for a walkabout! TFTC!
